cards.rules_text: Target player reveals their hand. You may choose a nonland card from it. If you do, that player discards that card. If you don't, put two stun counters on a creature or land they control.
cards.flavor_text: [i]As the Volkyr starved, foragers went out. Few returned. Fewer returned in time.[/i]

cards.rules_text:
Whenever this creature deals excess damage to a permanent, you may draw that many cards. If you do, discard that many cards.

cards.flavor_text: [i]The best Volkyr find their tools onsite.[/i]

Scavenge {4}{R}{W} [i]({4}{R}{W}, Exile this card from your graveyard: Put a number of +1/+1 counters equal to this card's power on target creature. Scavenge only as a sorcery.)[/i]

Menace
Whenever a battle you control is defeated or an attacking creature you control dies, the defending player loses 1 life.
cards.flavor_text: [i]Once dutiful stewards of the Underhalls, their honor was twisted by death's transience into a cult of glory and sacrifice.[/i]

Menace

cards.flavor_text:
[i]“Never flee the minotaur; you'd sooner stumble into another patrol than outrun the first.”
—Isthaen, traveling storybroker[/i]

cards.rules_text:
Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player, gain 1 life, then you may put a stun counter on it. If you do, that player discards a card.
{2}{B}, Discard a card: This creature can't be blocked except by Horrors this turn.

Menace, deathtouch
Whenever a creature blocks a creature you control, the blocking creature's controller loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.
{2}{R}: Target Minotaur must be blocked this turn if able.
cards.flavor_text: [i]Vassal to a king known only as myth.[/i]

cards.rules_text:
At end of combat on each player's turn, that player loses 1 life for each untapped creature they control. 
Whenever a creature you control deals combat damage to a player, you may put a stun counter on it. If you do, each player discards a card, then you draw a card.
cards.flavor_text: [i]Hope of home long lost, curiosity alone remains.[/i]

Exile target creature. You gain life equal to its toughness.

cards.flavor_text: [i]Deep cold induces a madness all its own.[/i]

cards.flavor_text: [i]One expedition's blunder can be another's end.[/i]

cards.rules_text: Target creature gets +3/+3 until end of turn. If {S} was spent to cast this spell, put three +1/+1 counters on that creature instead. [i]({S} is mana from a snow source.)[/i]
cards.flavor_text:
[i]“We struggle against the frost, the hunger, the horror. My struggle does not end today.”
—Excerpt from a Volkyr journal[/i]

cards.rules_text: When this enchantment enters, target nonland permanent an opponent controls phases out until this enchantment leaves the battlefield. [i](Treat it and anything attached to it as though they don't exist.)[/i]
cards.flavor_text: [i]The whispering winds preyed upon her fears, offering a twisted promise: One cannot be lost without purpose; nor betrayed, in solitude.[/i]

cards.flavor_text: [i]The Fonti do not abandon their lost.[/i]
